requirement_text: Go CLI shall build as single static binary with no runtime dependencies
Go CLI shall support all target platforms
Go CLI shall include version command with build metadata
Go CLI shall implement Status enum matching Python
Go CLI shall implement Priority enum matching Python
Go CLI shall implement Requirement struct with all fields
Go CLI shall parse CSV database identical to Python
Go CLI shall parse YAML config identical to Python
Go CLI shall implement RTMDatabase CRUD operations
Go CLI status command shall provide equivalent functionality to Python
Go CLI backlog command shall provide equivalent functionality to Python
Go CLI health command shall provide equivalent functionality to Python
Go CLI shall implement Tarjan SCC for cycle detection
Go CLI shall implement topological sort
Go CLI shall implement critical path analysis
Go CLI init command shall create minimal RTM structure
Go CLI from-tests shall parse pytest markers
Go CLI verify shall update status from tests
Go CLI shall implement GitHub adapter
Go CLI v1.0.0 shall achieve full feature parity
Go CLI reconcile command shall fix dependency reciprocity
Go CLI diff command shall compare RTM databases
Go CLI config command shall display and validate configuration
Go CLI makefile command shall generate Makefile targets
Go CLI docs command shall generate schema documentation
Go CLI setup command shall provide one-command project setup
Go CLI bootstrap command shall generate RTM from artifacts
Go CLI sync command shall synchronize with external services
Go CLI install command shall inject agent configs and git hooks
Go CLI validate-staged command shall validate CSV files pre-commit
Go CLI analyze command shall analyze project for requirements
Go CLI shall implement Jira adapter
Go CLI remote list/add/remove commands shall manage remotes
Go CLI markers command shall discover language-agnostic markers
Go CLI shall support shadow requirements for cross-repo deps
Go CLI shall implement grant delegation for access control
Go CLI serve command shall start web dashboard
Go CLI tui command shall launch terminal dashboard
Go CLI shall implement MCP server for AI integration
Go CLI auth commands shall implement Zitadel OIDC login
Go CLI shall integrate with OpenZiti for zero-trust networking
Go CLI shall implement CRDT for offline-first sync
Go CLI shall use GoReleaser for automated releases
Go CLI shall be installable via Homebrew tap
Python CLI shall emit deprecation warnings pointing to Go CLI
Go CLI shall include migrate command for Python users
Go CLI v1.0.0 stable release with full documentation
Go CLI shall use ASCII tables matching Python tabulate output
Go CLI shall display phase names from config in status output
notes: Output parity - status shows phase names

requirement_text: Go CLI status -v shall match Python category list format
notes: Output parity - -v shows category list not bars

requirement_text: Go CLI health shall show individual check results like Python
Go CLI deps shall show full requirements table like Python
target_value: Table with ID Deps Blocks Description
notes: Output parity - deps shows all reqs

requirement_text: Go CLI cycles shall show stats paths and recommendations
Go CLI shall use same color scheme as Python CLI
